line.text: Let those who are in favour with their stars
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of public honour and proud titles boast
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whilst I whom fortune of such triumph bars
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Unlooked for joy in that I honour most
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Great princes favourites their fair leaves spread
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But as the marigold at the sun eye
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And in themselves their pride lies buried
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For at a frown they in their glory die
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The painful warrior famoused for fight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: After a thousand victories once foiled
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Is from the book of honour razed quite
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And all the rest forgot for which he toiled
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then happy I that love and am beloved
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Where I may not remove nor be removed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
